meaningMnemonic: Because the hiragana ends with an う sound, you know this word is a verb. The kanji itself means <kanji>accompany</kanji> and the verb vocab version is <vocabulary>to accompany</vocabulary>. This can be used both literally and figuratively.
readingMnemonic: You need <vocabulary>to accompany</vocabulary> your friend, so to call out to them you yell "<reading>友, NOW</reading>!" (ともなう) to command them to come near you to accompany you to somewhere else.
